de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.flink.tpch.batch.config

Class TableSourceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.flink.tpch.batch.config.TableSourceProvider

  • public class TableSourceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    TableSourceProvider is used as a single table source provider for all 22 TPCH queries.
    Author:
    Hekmatullah Sajid and Seema Narasimha Swamy

        public void setBaseDir(java.lang.String path)

      • loadDataBatch

        public org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment loadDataBatch(org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                                           java.lang.String sf)
        Method used to read the data in the eight data sets by calling the right method, and register the TableSources in the ExecutionEnvironment.
        Parameters:
        env, - ExecutionEnvironment passed from main method to register the TableSources.
        sf, - defines the scale factor of data sets.
        Returns:
        BatchTableEnvironment used in queries for executing the queries.
